Text: HBUs Spirit of Excellence Gala Cc Hi Mr Lay I am Cheryl ThompsonDrapers assistant and she and her husband John Draper are on the Host Committee for Houston Baptist Universitys Spirit of Excellence Gala featuring General H Norman Schwarzkopf and honoring Eleanor McCollum Houston Livestock Show and Rodeo and The Robert Janice McNair Foundation The Gala will be held Tuesday October th at the Double Tree Hotel on Post Oak Cheryl and John would like to extend an invitation to you and your wife to be their guests at the worthy event Please let me know if you and Mrs Lay are able to attend Renee Balke Executive Asst to Cheryl L ThompsonDraper Warren Electric Group Office Fax wwwwarrenelectriccom winmaildat
